name: Intrusive Thoughts (ShannonBennetts)
description:
Intrusive Thoughts is a short, looping game/digital art piece based my experience with having Obsessive Compulsive Disorder. It was created back in 2017 as part of my Honours degree in Digital Arts, and was my first attempt at game making, so please bear that in mind XD.

While I didn't intend for it to be scary initially, I have gotten feedback that it can be quite tense to play, so just something to be aware of if you're sensitive to that sort of thing.

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask! For an in-depth breakdown of the game and its elements, check out the vid below:

Thanks for taking the time to play this :)
